name: Preternatural Parry
summary: You snap your weapon or limb into place to ward off harm at the last second.
description: You snap your weapon or limb into place to ward off harm at the last second. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws against the triggering effect until the start of your next turn.
trigger: You're targeted by a Strike or a spell attack roll, or you're about to roll a saving throw against a spell effect.
